sourcesContent:
import React , {useEffect} from 'react' import {Form, Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card} from "react-bootstrap" import {Link} from "react-router-dom" import {useDispatch, useSelector} from "react-redux" import Loader from "../components/Loader" import Message from "../components/CheckoutSteps" import {getOrderDetails} from "../actions/orderAction" export default function PlaceOrderScreen({match}) { const orderId = match.params.id const {order, loading, error} = useSelector(state => state.orderDetails) const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(getOrderDetails(orderId)) } , []) if (!loading && !error) {order.itemsPrice = order.orderItems.reduce((acc, item) => {return Number(acc + item.price * item.qty)}, 0) order.shippingPrice = (order.itemsPrice < 1000 ? Number((order.itemsPrice * 0.1).toFixed(2)) : 0)} return ( loading? : error? {error} :

Order {order._id}

Shipping

Name: {order.user.name}

Address {order.shippingAddress.address},
{order.shippingAddress.address},
{order.shippingAddress.postalCode},
{order.shippingAddress.country}

Payment Method

Method: {order.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{order.orderItems.length === 0 ? Your order is empty : ( {order.orderItems.map((item, index)=>{return ( {item.name} {item.qty} x ${item.price} = ${(item.qty * item.price).toFixed(2)} )})} )}

Order Summary

Items ${order.itemsPrice} 10% Shipping Fee (free for items over $1000) ${order.shippingPrice} Tax ${order.taxPrice} Total ${order.totalPrice}
) }
